title: feat: unified video resolution system + migrate Wan to Airforce
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Video Vision Unified
gist.blurb: We've synchronized our video swarms! All video models now speak the same resolution language, plus Wan gets a speed boost on Airforce.
gist.summary: Implemented a unified resolution system across all video models (Wan, Veo, Grok, LTX-2) and migrated the Wan model to the Airforce API.
gist.impact: Developers can now use consistent dimension parameters for all video generators, and Grok-video finally respects resolution settings.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a film editor or projectionist, managing multiple screens of different sizes that are now perfectly aligned. Represents the unification of video resolution logic.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot in a tiny retro projection booth, adjusting a glowing lime green (#ecf874) master lens that focuses multiple floating video screens. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'FOCUS'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
